properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 9:25PM EST until January 8 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph may produce blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Allegany county.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If
traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and
visibilities.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM EST WEDNESDAY
